result.arabic_text: لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
result.translation: Ntibonwa n’amaso y’ibiremwa kw’isi[17] mu gihe Yo Ibona ibiremwa vyose. Ni na Yo rero Rumenyi-Rudahishwa, Muhetuziwavyose!
result.footnotes: [17] Ariko mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, abemeramana bazoyibona n’amaso ukuri kwamye.
